tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My name is S Mahalingam, retired from the Airports Authority of India and I am  aged 83 years and a resident of  Ashok Nagar, Chennai. About 15 to 20 years back - when I was in my middle sixties - I developed some tooth problem: two of my teeth on the lower jaw had  decayed and required attention, possibly extraction. I then came to know that  a fairly new procedure termed " Root Canal Treatment " had come into practice wherein the treatment is done without extracting the decayed tooth. Then a co-resident in my flat complex suggested that I consult Dr N Venkatesan who he said is a very competent dentist.  I immediately sought and got an appointment with Dr.N.Venkatesan whose clinic is located fairly close to my residence. After examining my teeth as expected he suggested root canal treatment. He fully explained the modalities of that treatment. I agreed and he took up and completed the treatment for both the decayed teeth in about a week's time His fees were also very reasonable.I suffered absolutely no undue inconvenience or discomfort either during the treatment period or subsequent days and I was fully satisfied.
    In the subsequent few years my other teeth decayed progressively due to age. and Dr Venkatesan administrated the same root canal treatment. Until in a period of 4 or 5 years all my teeth both in the upper and lower jaws had been covered by that treatment. The treatment was fully satisfactory and there were absolutely no complications. His fees were also eminently reasonable. 
  Then. after that for over many years I had absolutely no problem regarding my teeth. I could eat well, even hard substances like nuts or murruku.Based on my experience with him many of my relatives have also become his patients.
    Dr. N.Venkatesan's " Venkaterwara Laser Dental Clinic and Implant Centre" is located at an easily accessible place near the Ranganathan Subway. It is equipped with state-of-art dental equipment. Dr. Venkatesan is a Cosmetic, Dental Surgeon,
Prosthodontist and Oral Implantologist, highly qualified with a string of academic degrees. He treats his patients with consideration and confidence and one suffers no tension when undergoing treatment under him
His fees are also moderate.
     I have been therefore happy to recommend Dr N Venkatesan to others who  are 
in need of dental treatment
reply_text:
Sir, We all are honoured & humbled by such a wonderful feedback from the former Chief, airport authority of india. 

Sir, We are very motivated hearing from u & will continue to strive providing the best treatments to our customers at an affordable cost...

Thanks a lot sirüôèüôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Event thing was well planned and organised and customer friendly approach

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I am a regular patient of Dr. N. Venkatesan for my all dental probs and my family also. Highly satisfied with his treatment for my dental problems. He patiently listens our problems and advises accordingly in detail. His service is excellent and cost effective. 
His team of staff also excellent, receptionist Priya does her duties meticulously, by giving appointments, then arranging successive sittings, explaining the medicines to be taken, dos and donts after the treatment.
The nursing assistant Pavithra also very affectionate, supportive and caring girl. 
I do suggest and refer Dr. N Venkatesan always in my friends and known circle. Thanks alot. God bless all.
reply_text:
It‚Äôs been almost 15yrs since u and ur family was with us for all ur dental treatment needs and we are we very happy to give u the best possible treatment in all scenario‚Äôs. 
Thanks a lot for ur continued support- Team VDICüôèü§ùüëçüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent service, Right from the booking of an appointment till the follow up it was completely well taken care by the Receptionist Priya. The Doctor is very patient and keenly listens to all our problems,gives us the best advice regd it and best treatment. The nurse Pavithra was also very kind and cooperative and made it all easier.Despite the pandemic, utmost care was taken to ensure the patient's safety and well-being. Thank you doctor and the dedicated team for their polite and patient treatment. Would highly recommend for all dental consultations.
reply_text: Thank u very much for ur time in providing ur feedback. Our team was very happy to have such an appreciation and are delighted which also helps to strive & give our best to our customers. We will continue to enhance our system in proving the best of dental care always.üôèüòäüëçü§ù

Dr. N. Venkatesan is an excellent dentist. He took the time to explain every procedure he was doing.  He is Highly experienced, patient friendly and his friendly approach give, lot hope to me for further process, He truly caring about the oral health.  
Dr. N. Venkatesan and his staff were extremely professional. They are doing regular follow ups, answering all the queries without any hesitations.
Affordable pricing for all the treatments. Highly Recommended.
I would like to recommend Dr. N. Venkatesan to everyone. ** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****
